<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/9b4a15d5dba354d2e1e02871470bad103f34769a|patch 8.2.0111: VAR_SPECIAL is also used for booleans>
patch 8.2.0111: VAR_SPECIAL is also used for booleans

Problem:    VAR_SPECIAL is also used for booleans.
Solution:   Add VAR_BOOL for better type checking.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0111: VAR_SPECIAL is also used for booleans · vim/vim@9b4a15d
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0111: VAR_SPECIAL is also used for booleans · vim/vim@9b4a15d
attachments.text: Problem: VAR_SPECIAL is also used for booleans. Solution: Add VAR_BOOL for better type checking.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/02ad46394e8f887b60fda994f8a5da2ac1937b23|patch 8.2.0112: illegal memory access when using 'cindent'>
patch 8.2.0112: illegal memory access when using 'cindent'

Problem:    Illegal memory access when using 'cindent'.
Solution:   Check for NUL byte. (Dominique Pelle, closes #5470)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0112: illegal memory access when using 'cindent' · vim/vim@02ad463
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0112: illegal memory access when using 'cindent' · vim/vim@02ad463
attachments.text: Problem: Illegal memory access when using 'cindent'. Solution: Check for NUL byte. (Dominique Pelle, closes #5470)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/9b24dfcb9f676e7f7a09a9062f0d05b2104a87eb|patch 8.2.0113: "make cmdidxs" fails>
patch 8.2.0113: "make cmdidxs" fails

Problem:    "make cmdidxs" fails.
Solution:   Allow address for ":cquit".  Add --not-a-term to avoid a delay.

attachments.title: patch 8.2.0113: "make cmdidxs" fails · vim/vim@9b24dfc
attachments.text: Problem: "make cmdidxs" fails. Solution: Allow address for ":cquit". Add --not-a-term to avoid a delay.
